attributes.action:
BAN DISPOSABLE CUPS
Complete ban on use of disposable cups by end of 2020
attributes.additional_details:
For further information and an opportunity to help stop this senseless waste now visit    www.nodisposablecup.com

For background on the UK government's own findings refer to 
https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201719/cmselect/cmenvaud/657/657.pdf

Why recycling disposable cups is not the answer? See BBC report
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-43739043
attributes.background:
DAILY we use 7 MILLION DISPOSABLE CUPS. 
500,000 are dropped as litter!
UK is one of the worst using 2.5 billion cups a year. Enough waste to create a pile as big as the Albert Hall!
Recycling is not the answer! STOPPING is the answer
The solution is simple BAN DISPOSABLE CUPS now (by end 2020)
